page.title: 05Rainhill's Recn. Club, cont.
page.content:
money hs helped to pay for further expansion. Three new all-weather tennis courts have been built with flood lighting and it is not unusual to see members playing tennis early in the morning and at all times of the year. Further additions are planned with money received from a Sports Council grant. The Club is an important part of the life of the Rainhill area.
Cost of membership for the tennis section is Â£10 for juniors, Â£16 for 'intermediates' and Â£28 for adults.
The bowling section costs Â£2 for all ages.
